trimText.description: Trim indicates whether the control shall grab the full width available

restrictText.description: Restricts the input length to the set value (in this case: 5)

unfocusedDescription.description: This description is shown even when the control is not focused

hideRequiredAsterisk.description: Hides the "*" symbol, when the field is required

toggle.description: The "toggle" option renders boolean values as a toggle.
